title: Still no brand nerfs.
body:
Tired of the support's passive doing 900 damage to me, even when it didn't even pop with the 3 hit ability.

https://i.imgur.com/QwXE36m.png

https://i.imgur.com/COhxda3.png

Why is a support solo carrying the game because of how fucking retarded his passive is? Why is the balance team too fucking scared to do anything? Why has he been like this the ENTIRE season? Why is the balance too insecure to admit that he's fucking blatantly overpowered? Why? Why must I wait even longer for this shit to happen? Can someone please explain this to me?
